ROW.PDT: *IF ( ( *VALUE NT_Event_Log.Source_U *EQ 'Foundation Agents' *AND *VALUE NT_Event_Log.Type *EQ Error *AND *SCAN NT_Event_Log.Description_U *NE 'Lights-Out has detected a controller interface error' ) *OR ( *VALUE NT_Event_Log.Source_U *EQ 'Server Agents' *AND *VALUE NT_Event_Log.Type *EQ Error *AND *SCAN NT_Event_Log.Description_U *NE 'Lights-Out has detected a controller interface error' ) ) *UNTIL ( *TTL 0:01:00:00 )
